title: SoC CMN 380-7-23 Junior Tutorial

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
DESCRIPTION:
Filmmakers will learn the craft of writing for the stage. Students will be assigned weekly plays to read that we will discuss in class, they will write three original short plays of their own, and we will workshop all material in class. In-class workshop of their original plays will be the primary focus of evaluation. Plays will be evaluated on professionalism, creativity, and the ability to effectively convey a story.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value: Students will be expected to read eight plays over the course of the quarter. If you purchase the plays, the cost will be approximately $100 total. Students are welcome to share plays or seek them out from the library when available.
